overview.description: Chhattisgarh, located in central India, is known for its lush forests, waterfalls, and rich tribal culture. Formed on November 1, 2000, it is a treasure trove of natural beauty with sites like Chitrakote Falls and the Barnawapara Wildlife Sanctuary.

top_destinations.name: Chitrakote Falls
top_destinations.description: Known as the 'Niagara of India', a stunning waterfall on the Indravati River.
top_destinations.travel_tips: Visit during monsoon for full flow; carry rain gear.

top_destinations.name: Raipur
top_destinations.description: The capital city with cultural sites like Mahant Ghasidas Museum and Dudhadhari Temple.
top_destinations.travel_tips: Explore local markets; visit during festivals.

top_destinations.name: Barnawapara Wildlife Sanctuary
top_destinations.description: A biodiversity hotspot with tigers, leopards, and diverse flora.

accommodation.name: Hotel Babylon International
accommodation.description: Luxurious stay in the heart of Raipur.

culinary_delights.name: Chhappan Bhog
culinary_delights.description: Famous for local dishes like bafauri and khurma.

culinary_delights.name: Tripti Restaurant
culinary_delights.description: Offers a variety of Indian cuisine.

culinary_delights.name: Cafe Coffee Day
culinary_delights.description: Cozy spot for coffee and snacks.

must_visit_spots.name: Chitrakote Falls
must_visit_spots.description: A breathtaking waterfall known as the 'Niagara of India'.
must_visit_spots.tip: Best viewed during monsoon; carry a camera.

must_visit_spots.name: Kanger Valley National Park
must_visit_spots.description: A biodiversity hotspot with caves and wildlife.
must_visit_spots.tip: Explore Kutumsar Caves with a guide.

must_visit_spots.name: Bastar
must_visit_spots.description: A tribal region with rich culture and Danteshwari Temple.

must_visit_spots.name: Sirpur
must_visit_spots.description: An ancient town with Buddhist ruins and temples.
must_visit_spots.tip: Visit early morning for a peaceful experience.

must_visit_spots.name: Mainpat
must_visit_spots.description: A hill station with waterfalls and lush greenery.
must_visit_spots.tip: Perfect for trekking and nature walks.

must_visit_spots.name: Amarkantak
must_visit_spots.description: The origin of Narmada River with spiritual significance.

travel_essentials.how_to_reach: By road: Raipur is 250 km from Nagpur (NH6, 5-6 hrs). By train: Raipur Junction connects major cities. By air: Swami Vivekananda Airport (Raipur).
travel_essentials.tips: Carry light clothing; respect tribal customs.
